message: Let's split it 50/50 and start with a clean slate!
You wanted 50/50, I'll give you 60% - is that enough to start the negotiations?
You're trying to take advantage of me with a 60/40 split. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to be too generous. Will you accept 55/45?
You're not budging on the 55/45 split? I'll meet you in the middle, but I think I deserve more than 52%
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a better deal. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't expect me to go any further. Will you accept 53/47?
You're still trying to squeeze out more, but I'm not backing down. I'll give you 53% - take it or leave it
